title: 45.2 (LOA)
content:
You find Spirit Speaker Nal sitting in quiet contemplation within a small gazebo in one of Lone Tree's many gardens, her legs crossed and eyes closed. She doesn't stir as you approach, but when you call out to her in greeting, her eyes flutter open.

"Oh, hello," she says with a wan smile. "Give me just a moment." She cocks her head to the side, as if she's listening to someone.

Clear Nal with   to ask her more about the presence she sensed in the arcology.
